Name of the deployment plan file. The filename can be absolute or relative to the application directory. This argument defaults to the plan/plan.xml file in the application directory, if one exists." upper="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptvalue|@value"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptinputassistance" target="_chainwindow"/></oninputassistant>

Name of the deployment plan file. The filename can be absolute or relative to the application directory. This argument defaults to the plan/plan.xml file in the application directory, if one exists.</entry> <entry name="customfield"/> <entry name="modifiable">1</entry> <entry name="regex"/> <entry name="required">0</entry> <entry name="initvalue"/> <entry name="xmlkey"/> <entry name="xmlpath"/> <entry name="multiline">0</entry> <entry name="multilineIcon">0</entry> <entry name="onchangereset"/> <entry name="resetable">1</entry> </properties> </text><dynradiogroup alt="1" enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_CREATE_PLANs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="Create Plan" tooltip="Boolean value indicating to create a default plan." required="0"> <properties> <entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry> <entry name="text">Create Plan</entry> <entry name="quotes"/> <entry name="id">UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_CREATE_PLANs.00</entry> <entry name="enabled">0</entry> <entry name="focus">0</entry> <entry name="tooltip">Boolean value indicating to create a default plan.</entry> <entry name="customfield"/> <entry name="modifiable">1</entry> <entry name="initvalue"/> <entry name="xmlkey"/> <entry name="xmlpath"/> </properties> </dynradiogroup><dynradiogroup alt="1" enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_REMOTEs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="Remote" tooltip="Boolean value specifying whether the operation will be remote from the file system that contains the source. Use this option when you are on a different machine from the Administration Server and the deployment files are already at the specified location where the Administration Server is located." required="0"> <properties> <entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry> <entry name="text">Remote</entry> <entry name="quotes"/> <entry name="id">UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_REMOTEs.00</entry> <entry name="enabled">0</entry> <entry name="focus">0</entry> <entry name="tooltip">Boolean value specifying whether the operation will be remote from the file system that contains the source. Use this option when you are on a different machine from the Administration Server and the deployment files are already at the specified location where the Administration Server is located.</entry> <entry name="customfield"/> <entry name="modifiable">1</entry> <entry name="initvalue"/> <entry name="xmlkey"/> <entry name="xmlpath"/> </properties> </dynradiogroup><dynradiogroup alt="1" enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_GRACEFULLYs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="Retire gracefully" tooltip="Retirement policy to gracefully retire an application only after it has completed all in-flight work. This policy is only meaningful for stop and redeploy operations and is mutually exclusive to the retire timeout policy." required="0"> <properties> <entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry> <entry name="text">Retire gracefully</entry> <entry name="quotes"/> <entry name="id">UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_GRACEFULLYs.00</entry> <entry name="enabled">0</entry> <entry name="focus">0</entry> <entry name="tooltip">Retirement policy to gracefully retire an application only after it has completed all in-flight work. This policy is only meaningful for stop and redeploy operations and is mutually exclusive to the retire timeout policy.</entry> <entry name="customfield"/> <entry name="modifiable">1</entry> <entry name="initvalue"/> <entry name="xmlkey"/> <entry name="xmlpath"/> </properties> </dynradiogroup><dynradiogroup alt="1" enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_UPLOADs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="Upload" tooltip="Boolean value specifying whether the application files are uploaded to the WebLogic Server Administration Server's upload directory prior to deployment. Use this option when the Administration Server cannot access the application files through the file system." required="0"> <properties> <entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry> <entry name="text">Upload</entry> <entry name="quotes"/> <entry name="id">UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_UPLOADs.00</entry> <entry name="enabled">0</entry> <entry name="focus">0</entry> <entry name="tooltip">Boolean value specifying whether the application files are uploaded to the WebLogic Server Administration Server's upload directory prior to deployment. Use this option when the Administration Server cannot access the application files through the file system.</entry> <entry name="customfield"/> <entry name="modifiable">1</entry> <entry name="initvalue"/> <entry name="xmlkey"/> <entry name="xmlpath"/> </properties> </dynradiogroup><integer alt="1" enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_RTIMEOUTs.00" max="" min="" nl="1" text="Retire Timeout" tooltip="Time (in seconds) WLST waits before retiring an application that has been replaced with a newer version. This option default to -1, which specifies gracefull timeout."> <properties> <entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC_DATATYPE_NUMERIC</entry> <entry name="text">Retire Timeout</entry> <entry name="min"/> <entry name="max"/> <entry name="quotes"/> <entry name="id">UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_RTIMEOUTs.00</entry> <entry name="enabled">0</entry> <entry name="focus">0</entry> <entry name="tooltip">Time (in seconds) WLST waits before retiring an application that has been replaced with a newer version. This option default to -1, which specifies gracefull timeout.</entry> <entry name="customfield"/> <entry name="modifiable">1</entry> <entry name="initvalue">0</entry> </properties> </integer><integer alt="1" enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_TIMEOUTs.00" max="" min="" nl="1" text="Timeout" tooltip="Time (in milliseconds) that WLST waits for the deployment process to complete before canceling the operation. A value of 0 indicates that the operation will not time out. This argument defaults to 300,000 ms (or 5 minutes)."> <properties> <entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC_DATATYPE_NUMERIC</entry> <entry name="text">Timeout</entry> <entry name="min"/> <entry name="max"/> <entry name="quotes"/> <entry name="id">UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_TIMEOUTs.00</entry> <entry name="enabled">0</entry> <entry name="focus">0</entry> <entry name="tooltip">Time (in milliseconds) that WLST waits for the deployment process to complete before canceling the operation. A value of 0 indicates that the operation will not time out. This argument defaults to 300,000 ms (or 5 minutes).</entry> <entry name="customfield"/> <entry name="modifiable">1</entry> <entry name="initvalue">0</entry> </properties> </integer></readpanel></dialog>

PROMPTSETDATA.DATAEDITOR: <PRPTS ontop="1"><PRPTBOX><UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_APP_NAMEs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_APP_NAME#" ReadFromTable="OPSE"></UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_APP_NAMEs.00><UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_PACKAGEs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_PACKAGE#" ReadFromTable="OPSE"></UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_PACKAGEs.00><UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_VERSIONs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_VERSION#" ReadFromTable="OPSE"></UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_VERSIONs.00><UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_A_VERSIONs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_A_VERSION#" ReadFromTable="OPSE"></UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_A_VERSIONs.00><UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_PLAN_PATHs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_PLAN_PATH#" ReadFromTable="OPSE"></UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_PLAN_PATHs.00><UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_CREATE_PLANs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_CREATE_PLAN#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">NO</UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_CREATE_PLANs.00><UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_REMOTEs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_REMOTE#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">NO</UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_REMOTEs.00><UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_GRACEFULLYs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_GRACEFULLY#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">NO</UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_GRACEFULLYs.00><UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_UPLOADs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_UPLOAD#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">NO</UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_UPLOADs.00><UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_RTIMEOUTs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_RTIMEOUT#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">-1</UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_RTIMEOUTs.00><UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_TIMEOUTs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_TIMEOUT#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">300000</UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_TIMEOUTs.00></PRPTBOX></PRPTS>
